title: Define EmotionRegulator Requirements and Functionalities
description: Document the essential features, user needs, safety considerations, regulatory compliance, and technical requirements of the EmotionRegulator device.

title: Design EmotionRegulator Hardware Architecture
description: Create a hardware design for the wearable device, considering components required for chemical delivery, user interface, power management, and safety features.

title: Develop User Interface (Frontend)
description: Create a user-friendly interface for controlling the device and monitoring its status, including app design, wireframing, and prototyping.

title: Implement Backend Logic for Data Processing
description: Develop server-side logic to process data from the device, analyze user input, and adjust chemical delivery accordingly.

title: Establish Database Schema and Integration
description: Create the database schema to store user data, device settings, and analytics, as well as integrate the database with the frontend and backend components.
dependencies: Implement Backend Logic for Data Processing

title: Test EmotionRegulator Hardware Components
description: Perform hardware testing to ensure the device's components are functioning correctly and safely, including safety certifications if necessary.

title: Test Software Components (Frontend and Backend)
description: Perform unit testing, integration testing, and system testing on the frontend and backend components to ensure they are functioning correctly.
dependencies: Implement Backend Logic for Data Processing

title: Refine and Optimize EmotionRegulator Design
description: Iterate on the design of the device, addressing any issues or user feedback identified during testing.

title: Document EmotionRegulator Development Process
description: Write technical documentation for the development process, including design specifications, code implementation, testing results, and any relevant best practices.
